name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Backend Developer with 13+ years of experience in high-performance application delivery, specializing in **.NET**, **Spring Boot**, and cloud services, particularly **AWS**. Adept in API Design and Data Validation, ensuring robust and secure backend architectures. Proven track record of creating efficient server-side logic and services, contributing to scalability and performance enhancements in various applications. 

Demonstrated capacity in implementing microservices, achieving seamless integration, and fostering automation through CI/CD pipelines. Strong familiarity with compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with regulatory standards. Additional expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and implementing **AI/ML** strategies, showcasing adaptability and a prowess for leveraging a diverse tech stack.
